Package besucha.backend.algorithm

Class BalancedConflictAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • besucha.backend.model.algorithm.ConflictAlgorithm
      • besucha.backend.model.algorithm.BalancedConflictAlgorithm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm
    public class BalancedConflictAlgorithm
extends ConflictAlgorithm
    Enrollment Algorithm designed around dealing with potentially over-enrolling/conflicting classes, while ensuring no criterion is given special weight when determining priority

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class besucha.backend.algorithm.ConflictAlgorithm

        private boolean restartEnrollment​(Section sect,
                                  java.util.Queue<Student> enrolleeQueue,
                                  int priority)
        Performs the prioritized enrollment process on a given queue of students into a section, so long as the next student has the proper priority
        Parameters:
        sect - the section to enroll into
        enrolleeQueue - the queue of students wanting to enroll into the class, sorted by priority
        priority - the necessary priority to enroll into the class.
        Returns:
        if the section was filled by the enrollment
